location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to John Elphinston, Accountant General, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage and a large hole in the second folio has obscured significant amounts of text, which means that parts of this folio are difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of the receipt of orders of unknown date. The Resident also encloses reports of sales at Bushire for the years 1805/06 and 1806/07 (not present), as well as other returns (also not present). It also notes why certain sales have not been appearing on the company's credit.
